title: Showtime PPV - Saul Alvarez Vs. Erislandy Lara FULL PPV + COUNTD
description:
2014-07-12 Showtime PPV - Saul Alvarez Vs. Erislandy Lara FULL PPV + COUNTDOWN 720p Showtime PPV 
The format is m2ts file. 
The overall quality is Excellent 
The language is English 





This is the Full PPV HD broadcast of the Saul Alvarez Vs. Erislandy Lara PPV on 2014-07-12 from MGM Grand, Grand Garden Arena, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA. The first fight is included in the countdown show that aired prior to the PPV starting.

Fights on the card,

Tomoki Kameda [29-0] Vs. Pungluang Sor Singyu	[46-2]
SCHEDULED FOR 12 ROUNDS FOR KAMEDA'S WBO BANTAMWEIGHT TITLE

Johan Perez [19-1-1] Vs. Mauricio Herrera [20-4]
SCHEDULED FOR 12 ROUNDS FOR PEREZ'S INTERIM WBA LIGHT WELTERWEIGHT TITLE

Juan Manuel Lopez [34-3] Vs. Francisco Vargas [19-0-1]
SCHEDULED FOR 10 ROUNDS IN THE SUPER FEATHERWEIGHT DIVISION

Abner Mares [26-1-1] Vs. Jonathan Oquendo [24-3]
SCHEDULED FOR 10 ROUNDS IN THE FEATHERWEIGHT DIVISION

Saul Alvarez [43-1-1] Vs. Erislandy Lara [19-1-2]
SCHEDULED FOR 12 ROUNDS IN THE MIDDLEWEIGHT DIVISION (CATCH WEIGHT @ 155)
